relevant_findings.hypotonia: Severe hypotonia with no possibility of sitting or standing

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Tachycardia abated to 84 bpm after treatment; weight gained 3 kg in one year.

relevant_findings.FT3: Reduced to 3.1 pmol/L after PTU treatment
relevant_findings.SHBG: Reduced to 72 nmol/L after PTU treatment
relevant_findings.TSH: High levels (up to 50.1 mU/L) during PTU treatment

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: FT3 levels normalized but remained slightly high (6.6 pmol/l) after additional LT4 treatment; weight gain improved from 200 g/yr to 3 kg/yr.
